name: Potion Seller (OldFacedBaby)
description:
How will you make a living for your family of three? Easy! You gotta make and sell those potions!

You and three other friends will be either helping each other or sabotaging each other to make the most moola. Random ingredients will grow on the fields, and it is your job as the potion master to collect three ingredients and make a potion to sell immediately! Watch out though! There's some nasties laying about that you can accidentally or not accidentally that can sabotage you or your enemies's potions.

So get out there and make a living for yourself!
